@graph.name: Hoisin Tofu Mushroom Stir Fry
@graph.description: Hoisin Tofu Mushroom Stir Fry with homemade Hoisin Sauce. Easy Weeknight Meal with crisped Tofu, golden mushrooms, broccoli, peppers in from scratch Hoisin sauce. Serve over cooked grains. Vegan Gluten-free Recipe.

video.name: Hoisin Tofu Mushroom Stir Fry with from scratch hoisin sauce - VeganRicha.com
video.description:
Hoisin Tofu Mushroom Stir Fry with homemade Hoisin Sauce. Easy Weeknight Meal with crisped Tofu, golden crimini mushrooms, broccoli, peppers in from scratch Hoisin sauce. Serve over cooked grains. Vegan Gluten-free Recipe. 

Recipe ---- http://www.veganricha.com/2016/09/hoisin-tofu-mushroom-stir-fry.html

recipeIngredient: 3 tbsp soy sauce (use tamari to make gluten-free)
2 tbsp smooth peanut butter or almond butter
1 tbsp sugar or sweetener of choice
a generous dash of black pepper
6 to 8 oz sliced crimini  (or white mushrooms)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add pressed tofu and cook until golden on most sides. 5 to 7 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add pressed tofu and cook until golden on most sides. 5 to 7 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove tofu from pan. Add mushrooms, garlic, a pinch of salt and pepper flakes and cook until golden on some sides. 6 to 8 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove tofu from pan. Add mushrooms, garlic, a pinch of salt and pepper flakes and cook until golden on some sides. 6 to 8 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the broccolini, peppers or other veggies and mix in.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the broccolini, peppers or other veggies and mix in.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the sauce ingredients, 1/2 cup water and crisped tofu and mix in. Bring to a boil. use the spatula to mix the almond butter in. You can blend the ingredients before adding for easy mixing. You can also add a little miso for additional pungent flavor.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the sauce ingredients, 1/2 cup water and crisped tofu and mix in. Bring to a boil. use the spatula to mix the almond butter in. You can blend the ingredients before adding for easy mixing. You can also add a little miso for additional pungent flavor.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix starch in the remaining 1/4 cup water and add to the skillet. Simmer until the sauce thickens. 3 to 4 mins. Taste and adjust salt, sweet, heat and mix in. Serve over cooked rice or other grains.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix starch in the remaining 1/4 cup water and add to the skillet. Simmer until the sauce thickens. 3 to 4 mins. Taste and adjust salt, sweet, heat and mix in. Serve over cooked rice or other grains.
